title: Private, Bright, Clean, & Quiet
description: 2 bedroom side by side duplex on 1.3 acres in Scituate
Private washer & dryer in cellar with plenty of storage
Plenty of cabinet space, dishwasher, & dining room
Many windows providing sun light throughout apartment
Conscientious landlord – out to please tenants
Current tenant in apartment for 5.5 years and leaving to purchase home
Tenant in other unit has occupied apartment for 5 years
Oil heat and electric responsibility of tenants; estimate $2,500-3,000 per year
Credit check and security deposit required upon move in
Neighboring Johnston and Cranston.  30 minutes to Providence.
